name: appreciably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is enough to have an important effect: Her health has improved appreciably since she changed her treatment. At 60, I find I now have appreciably less hair. See
appreciable
More examplesFewer examplesThis monitor is appreciably better than the old one.My sister's house is appreciably larger and roomier then ours. The city has changed appreciably over the last 30 years.
